Module GNIOT_CRS_POS_PROJECT
Package com.gniot.crs.dao

Class UserDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.gniot.crs.dao.UserDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDAOInterface
public class UserDAOImpl extends Object implements UserDAOInterface
Implementation of UserDAOInterface. This class provides methods to perform user authentication, registration, and password management.

    • getConnection

      public static Connection getConnection() throws SQLException
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • login

      public void login()
      Performs user login. This method prompts the user to enter their username and password, authenticates the user credentials against the database, and redirects the user to the appropriate menu based on their role (student, admin, professor).
      Specified by:
      login in interface UserDAOInterface

    • register

      public void register() throws RegistrationException
      Registers a new user. This method allows a new user to register by providing a username, password, and role. If the user is a student, additional information such as name, gender, age, etc., is collected. After successful registration, the user's information is stored in the database. Students are required to wait for admin approval before they can log in.
      Specified by:
      register in interface UserDAOInterface
      Throws:
      RegistrationException

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword()
      Changes the password of a user. This method allows a logged-in user to change their password. The user is prompted to enter their old password for verification and then provide a new password. The new password is updated in the database after successful authentication.
      Specified by:
      changePassword in interface UserDAOInterface

    • isApproved

      public boolean isApproved(String username)

    • findUserByUsername

      public User findUserByUsername(String username)
      Description copied from interface: UserDAOInterface
      Finds a user by username. This method retrieves user information based on the username.
      Specified by:
      findUserByUsername in interface UserDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to find
      Returns:
      the User object corresponding to the username, or null if not found
